motivators.title: Manager Relationship
motivators.description: Having a supportive and understanding manager can significantly enhance job satisfaction and productivity. A good manager relationship means open communication, trust, respect, and mutual support.

motivators.title: Meaningful Work
motivators.description: Engagement in work that feels significant and impactful can lead to greater job satisfaction and personal fulfillment. Meaningful work involves contributing to something greater than oneself and understanding how oneâ€™s work fits into the larger picture.

motivators.title: Personal Impact
motivators.description: Feeling that you can make a difference in your role, directly influencing outcomes and progress, creates a sense of empowerment and job satisfaction. Personal impact is about having autonomy and being recognized for your contributions.
